front.title: It's Often True: Security's Ignored (IOTSI) - and Privacy too.

abstract.t: Designers of information models for challenged devices connected to the Internet, and most especially for devices that will be carried by people or that will be operating in people's homes, need to not forget that people own the devices and the data, and expect those to work for them, not against them. This draft discusses some security and privacy issues that may be relevant for the IAB's IOTSI workshop on information models for such devices and related services.
